Your Summer Anthem is Best Of You by the Foo Fighters I've got another confession my friend I'm no fool I'm getting tired of starting again Somewhere new While you may seem bright on the outside, your insides have a distinct angst flavor.
What's Your 2005 Summer Anthem?
Hmm, seems interestingly accurate .... Well I'm updating!! Nanners better be happy. Life's been a whole mess of work and work and a lil bit of sleeping thrown in. It's been crazy. I'm getting to chill out w/some cool ppl tho, which is always a good thing, so maybe this summer isnt quite as bad as I thought it would be. I'm sleepy ... that is all ... peace out homies

Your Love Style is Eros
For you, love is all about the passion! And chances are, you're currently in love. You have a strong physical response to love... And you are great at committing (As long as the person makes your toes curl!)

You are elegant, withdrawn, and brilliant. Your mind is a weapon, able to solve any puzzle. You are also great at poking holes in arguments and common beliefs. For you, comfort and calm are very important. You tend to thrive on your own and shrug off most affection. You prefer to protect your emotions and stay strong.
The World's Shortest Personality Test

Part Shy Kisser

You *do* love to kiss, once your comfortable with it And that means knowing the person you're kissing pretty well You usually don't make the first move when it comes to making out But you've got plenty of intensity in return

Part Expert Kisser

You're a kissing pro, but it's all about quality and not quantity You've perfected your kissing technique and can knock anyone's socks off And you're adaptable, giving each partner what they crave When it comes down to it, your kisses are truly unforgettable
What Kind of Kisser Are You?

wut up homies, 

this is pretty much a pointless update ... just a little something for my HUGE fan base lol ... 

friday keller and i went to go see the amityville horror lol ... and i found out how much of a girl he is when it comes to scary movies AND IT WAS AWESOME!!! lol ... he will forever go with me to scary movies lol ... i think the two greatest things he said during the movie were "the covers wont save u u stupid kid" lol and "i hate this movie and i hate u ::runs out of theater:: LOL ... 

Saturday was uneventful ... my mother and i went out and i sat around and worked and stuff ... relaxing ... AND will ferrel was on SNL so i attempted to stay up for that and passed out at 1 so i did pretty good ... FRAZZLE SNAZZLE lol 

today was full of me not having any sleep lol ... i worked 6-11 in the AM lol gay ... then i had to go pretend to be a photographer for my cousin at her little fashion show ... it was kinda fun ... but i had to deal with family that i dont care for and listen to their judgemental shit about my "white" boyfriend ... UMM HELLO PEOPLE ... i am no the blackest person ... and aside from my father everyone else is as light as i am ... fuckin amazing ... whatever ... my family is jerks sometimes lol 

so now im sitting here passing the time before i become an old woman and go to bed at 1030 LOL ... i am so ridiculous lol ... talk to u later kiddos 

::curtsies::

OMG Anna you are so mean!!! LOL 


Tis Kristen ... Finally I am updating!!!!!


Only for a little tho lol

It is 8:43 in the am and I hafta leave for class in 2 mins.  I have a stupid presentation to do today for my least fave class - US Latin American Relations - hopefully it goes ok.  I hate having 9 am classes and being an insomniac ... sux the butt.

Speaking of that, I'm totally an insomniac lol.  I never sleep and then I wake up and do stuff when I should be sleeping.  Go figure.  So yeah, things have been difficult in my drama filled life lately ... breakups are never fun.  But you live right?

Hmm, now its 8:44 and i have nothing else to talk about, I only updated cuz Anna totally yelled at me!  And DONT CHANGE THIS PASSWORD LOL.  


Peace out homies!

ok so i dont no y im updating ... im just feelin lazy today and not wanting to work on any school type stuff to make sure i dont fail this semester lol ... what are u gonna do ... 

so im officially mad at Kristen Vaughan ... she has completely ditched this damn livejournal crap and has left me with the load of updating (which i do o-so-frequently lol) ... i see how it is ... and she actually has stuff to talk about to ... but she has time to update her myspace ... WHATEVER lol ... some people ... wait till i change the password on her ... if she even remembers it lol

speakin of kris, i went to her school last wednesday to see her through some rough times ... i am so helpful lol ... met some of her friends ... interesting ... bonded with her roommate Sweatha about my new Indian friends at Kean lol (shes indian so we are tight now lol) ... we ate dunkin donuts at 11 in the PM ... can anyone else see a problem with this when u havent had a real dinner, cause i was annoyed but whateve i am not one to pass up food so i sucked it up ... 

other than that there is nothing new really ... the midget and i have discovered that being married can sometimes suck ... she has more of a problem then i will ever have cause her "man" has a boyfriend so lol ... but its ok cause we are goin on a most excellent cruise in August with the most excellent person James T. Keller IV or something lol ... off for some massive drunkenness in the Bahamas and Florida playin shuffle board and golf and layin on the cruise decks bakin like chickens in the sun lol ... ahhhh i can not wait ... its ashame im not going lol ... damn noreweigan dawn and freak 10 story waves crashing into it lol ... would have been nice to go lol (even though keller informed me that he was a lifeguard LOL i still am sketchy lol)

lol i love college on days like today cause im sittin here at 1230 in the afternoon, still in pajamas, watching my daily dose of day time television ... how can anyone pass up a line up of 2 hours of Dawsons Creek, $40 a day with Racheal Ray, Maury ("the man i love needs to know - i have sex for money" lol), Days of our Lives, and then Passions ... I LOVE COLLEGE!!!!!!!! lol ... all i need are some bon-bons and Kristen hair teased a mile high and u can call me Peg Bundy lol ... 

hmm well i have run out of stupid shit to talk about ... lol so im off to watch the disfuntion on Maury ... peace out everybody

::curtsies::

HAPPY 21st BIRFDAY KRISTEN VAUGHAN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!


shes ooooooooooooooooooooold ... lol


::curtsies::

Wut up homies,
i dunno y im updating, i have absolutely nothing to say ... nothing new ... nothing exciting ... just plain old blah ...

anywho ... im still doin the school thing ... freakin end of my junior year in college ... how gross is that im such an old shriveled up woman its not even funny lol ... i think im finally starting to enjoy my major ... its about time ... although, i dont no if im enjoying it or its becoming more tolerable lol ... whatever i shall bask in it for now and try to be positive for once ... 

OOO the courtney m. stockdale, james t. keller the some number i cant remember, and anna m. peterson would like to invite anyone who has over a thousand dollars to join us on a awesome sweet super cool cruise in august ... let us no (and by us i mean me cause im the one whos lookin up the shit lol) so we could all partay and be tan this year .... we shall all be 21 and kris will be gambling, i will be loungin, the midget will be shoppin, and keller will be mackin lol ... join us fools lol ....

im bored with this entry cause im bleeding and giacomo is of course annoying me -- not because of anything hes doin ... mainly cause im bleeding lol ... 

::curtsies::

Rest in Peace Andrew


My thoughts and prays are with u, your family and ur friends



::curtsies::

King Keller III (10:45:33 PM): i can get like 1000 bandaids at the johnson and johnson employee store for like 2 bucks
King Keller III (10:45:36 PM): isnt that incredible
FlingPoo314 (10:45:45 PM): LOL that is cause i LOVE bandaids lol 

band-aids ... FUCK YEA!!! lol 


::curtsies:: 

ps i think giacomo is the only one who will get that lol

Wut up home slices ... tis the magnificant anna .... just started that .. doubt it will stick but thats what im gonna call myself lol 

Anywho ... im in my color separation class and there is an hour before my Spanish lab so i thought now would be as good a time as any to update about my super boring life and how it is more boring then anyone elses thus makin me the queen of boring shit ... ha, i win. 

yea so lol .... ive just been doin the school thing and man do i hate this shit ... seriosuly school is so mindnumbing ... and for me it goes two ways ... it either makes me feel like the stupidest person in the land (which granted i do have mildly retarded moments lol) or it will make me feel totally unchallenged and bored and ready for a nap -- i would also like to note that when it makes me feel stupid i wish to nap then as well lol
lately ive been feeling dumber and dumber tho ... i thinks its cause i have to deal with ppl who are all excited about what they wanna do with their degrees and actually are motivated to do something with their lives and im so confused as to y i keep feeling like im the only person who feels like i shouldnt have to decide what i wanna do with my life at 20 years old ... im comfortable with the level of responsibility i have now i dont want anything else ... change scares the magnificant anna and she can not deal with it.  I wish i could be like keller ... hes like my idol right now ... seriously lol ... i said keller ... JAMES KELLER lol ... he is so motivated and has such a clear vision for his future (granted all hes doin is sittin on a boat in some random ass contry watchin cars drive around in circles on a tv lol but at least he has that lol)... hes like makin things work for him and im still scheduling classes around watchin days of our lives and takin naps lol ... i no for a fact that i am one of the most mature ppl that i no but yet i still wanna be a 16 year old who could give a shit about what college to go to and just hang out with the midget in the the wagon all day lol ... those were the best freakin years ... these years suck my ass through a straw ... definately gotta agree with benjy on that one (side note i miss that girl so much) ... i dunno a part of me is still done with college and is ready to be a grown up (as kristen and i like to say) but then in come those damn naps again lol ... 
it doesnt help that i hate everyone in my major department cause half of em are mexican and the other half is some fucked up nationality that cant even speak english ... then of course there is the fat lady who steals books but dont get me started on her lol ... i think these ppl are discouraging me from being here which sucks cause i no i can be good at this ... i mean .. i actually understand all this shit about color gametes and offest lithographic prepress and screening techniques ... my major is actually pretty cool cause its so hands on but god these ppl make me want to kill myself or declare a new major (which at this point in my junior year is no longer an option so i guess i must chose death lol) ... if i were to change to a department i think id stick to business management ... im pretty good in that stuff plus i like to be in charge and in control of ppls lives and such lol im sure a quality that is not favored by all of my fans lol ... or id do some type of psychology (but not the boring research crap giacomo is doing ... sorry babe but omg lol) ... i like to listen to ppls stories and then decide why they are fucked up and then judge them lol im SOOO good at that lol -- yet another one of those favorable qualities lol ... i dunno now im thinkin i wanna go come back after graduate school and like do continuing education in those feilds or something ... i wanna do a little bit of everything cause like giacomo said im pretty good at a little bit of everything ... blah 

ok so theres that lol ... ranted for about an hour on how useless my schooling is lol ... now on to more exciting things ... for me anyway cause im the only one who reads this (yes i read my own journal im a vain piece of shit so get over it lol) ... i just got back from visiting giacomo and let me tell u i heart that kid more then i heart all the monkies and tacos in the world ... i heart everything about our relationship ... the way we no so much about each other, the way hes like the girl and im like the boy, the way he listens and i dont lol, the way we do crossword puzzles even tho he wont let me cheat lol, they way we fight is always entertaining lol, the way we annoy the shit out of each other to the point of extreme hatred then 5 seconds later its all good, the way he crushes me in my sleep lol, the way he takes care of me and actually DOES feel sympatheitc to me despite what his stupid ass may think and say and even act sometimes ... i even love the way he dresses even tho i hate the two toned shoes and the jerseys and the damn hate (sorry but its all the time giacomo lol) ... plus we have the bestest sex lol ... not that i have anything to compare it to but i imagine all great sex is like this lol ... hes so pretty and im thinkin thats all for the mushy segment of my life 

my hands are gettin tired and crampy and im five seconds im gonna have carpal tunel lol so ... tis time for me to say goodbye to all my company ... now im gonna have that damn mickey mouse club song stuck in my head ... peace out homies 

::curtsies::

wut up homies ... tis anna this time, 

just got back from playin some late night tennis with keller on a randomly lit basketball court in the boonies of howell ... very very safe ... specially with all the bats lol 
-- ladies if ur wondering ... Keller will not protect u in case of danger lol 

it was such good times ... i heart when that kid comes home ... such good conversations for two hours of the worst tennis playin ever lol 

one key thing to remember from the night tho is:
Anna: i dont no y ppl wanna have sex tho ... cause u make weird faces, theres funny noises involved sometimes ... and its kinda stinky lol ... always remember keep ur windows open 
Anna: dont have drunken sex .. cause thats how u get babies ... babies and AIDS 

im a fountain of wisdom i am ... well apparently only when it comes to sex i guess lol ... hopefully Keller finds it to be useful ...

Well my fat tired ass needs to eat something and sleep for i have yet another long tireous day ahead of me lol ... 

peace out everybody

::curtsies::

Okey dokey smokeys, Kristen here ready to update all of u on the most interesting things going on in my life.


OK thats all thanks.



LOL yeah I crack myself up.  Well it's been mad amnts of work, I have a paper due next mon, tues, weds, and thurs, plus a presentation and take home test thats 4-6 pgs long.  Needless to say, I haven't gotten out much.

I did get to the gym yesterday and finally got to run on my ankle, it feels sooo stiff today but I'm glad I pushed it.  Today = the bike, glorious sitting down machine I tell ya.  I have been sucking down these liters of water, my goodness.  AND I am monstrously hungry lol.  I have the strangest urge for singapore mei fun.  Like death I want this my god.

So what else, well there's always drama, but I choose to internalize it or just tell Anna.  So ha.

Speaking of which, I had a most excellent political discussion with that girl, and for future reference, political science will now be known as chicken and subs.  Trust me folks, it makes it a whooole lot interesting, and I'm a political science major.  Speaking of which, debates tonite, should be extremely boring, I'm looking forward to it lol.

Ok time to get back to my buttload of work, maybe I'll convince my roomie to go out and get some dinner w/me off campus, I'm not feelin the on campus food today....

Peace out mofos

Hey what is up its Kristen ::gasp::

So I've decided that Anna and I have started this journal craze.  I mean seriously, we had one (well maybe we were like 3rd) and now EVERYONE has them....and so many talk about their feelings and love and unicorns and glitter.  Thats weird lol.

But whatever my life's not much more exciting so I choose to talk about MY feelings and dolphins and beams of light that move around the room and u try to figure out if its something on u thats reflecting it and u think ur controlling it only to realize that its some dork next to you...

but i digress lol

So yeah finally back at Drew, had a big dilemma w/my classes and stuff, but thats all taken care of thank god...so now i just gotta hunker down and do some work, LOTS and LOTS of reading but hopefully I can figure it out.

Hung w/that man of mine, hes awesome...the things he does for me....makes me smile....I've come to the realization that relationships have potential to actually get BETTER over time, as opposed to my theory that it just dwindles down and you get bored after a week....so yeah thats a good thing to kno now right?

so me thinx thats about it...im off to do some (u guessed it) reading...god this mumbo jumbo is boring, but im only doing it cuz my roomie (who by the way is the new indian exchange student on the partridge family) told me to

peace out mofos....

ok updating for no reason 

i stalk boys at school now .... seriously ... followed darren (whos last name is devonshire by the way ... not boyd ... so close lol) he smokes and dispite my hatred for smokin he made it look so very pretty lol ... but seriously no lie stalked him around kean thursday cause im a weirdo/loser lol 

took my tennis class ... the dirt bag teacher made us play outside in the muggy humid weather so that i had friz AND i was sweating ... so basically i am not happy with this teacher ... today my ass hurts from all the physcial activity ive been doin lol ... being fat/old/lazy sucks ass lol

just got back from lunch with the midget ... we also went with her padre, musto, her brother kyle (my all time fav) and his "interesting" girlfriend jill ... whom by the way walked in on me and court in the bathroom when we were talkin shit about her (we think LOL)

i guess thats it ... so ... peace 

::curtsies::

so ... school = gay so far ... one of my classes has been cancelled already cause of low enrollment ... fags ... my tennis teacher thought it would be cool to not show up for class today (which was better cause i left early lol) ... and starting next week my life will go back to full on sucking cause that boy i make out with on a daily basis will be leaving me once again for strange beings with dicks who like to drink and stab things (greg lol) .... 

BUT there of course is a plus .... in my organization and management class (dont ask me what it is i have no clue lol) there is this amazing male being ... his name is darren and he is this spectacular mix of Brandon Boyd and Jesus .... it was like i was literally in an 80's brat pack movie such as sixteen candles (and i was molly ringwald only minus all the shitty red hair)... the guy walked in and this brilliant light eluminated all around him like he was glowing .... of course now i realize it is not because he was sent to me from God but because there were no lights on in the class room and the hallway light was pretty much doin that to everyone who came into the class lol ... but whatever ... HIS NAME IS DARREN ... AS IN DARREN BOYD, BRANDONS BROTHER ... i mean COME ON!!!!!!!!!!!! I told giacomo ... i dont think he cared so much cause he was playin football AND he was more intrigued by me using Jesus as a description of this person lol .... 

ahh my life is so weird ... im tired ... i have work 630-1 tomorrow and two days left with my giacomo so i must rest now children .... 

::curtsies::

i just saw an accident .... twas only one car in front of me ... im freaked out .... giacomo is so the best boyfriend ever and when he leaves i will be lost and annoying once again ... im now watching six feet under ... i love him 

::curtsies::

i just spent the last two and a half hours on this damn computer tryin to figure out what kind of jobs i can have with this retardo major of mine ... im so f'd ... i dont no what i want to do ... im only 20 ... and thats not that old but yet its SOOOOO over the hill ... and im panicking cause im not gonna have any money .... or a decent job ... I DONT NO WHAT I WANT TO DO!!!!!!! 

am i the only person who feels this way ... cause im about to have a nervous breakdown .... my nonexistent children are gonna be living in a box outside of the house i already live in cause my parents are gonna kick me out when they find out i have wasted four years of college with a RETARDO major ... i wanna die ... lol ... and giacomos not gonna have money till hes like 50 with what he wants to do lol .... omg i can see my whole life flashing before my eyes ... 

i cant breathe .... Y CANT I BE 5 AGAIN GODDAMNIT .... i wish i could just be a teacher cause that seems to be the easiest thing to do ... everyones doin it now a days ... i hate children tho ... ugh ... college blows huge chunks of ass cause it makes u realize ur worst fear ever ... u are truly good at NOTHING! ... 

::curtsies::

This is Kristen!!!! haha


So really this message is for Anna and such...

This summer has totally sucked and I miss u so much :-(

We hafta get together this week or next week or all of those weeks, cuz I hafta hear about ur disneyworld trip and continue the craziness of the dying fat ladies!  So if u see this, comment back or call or whatever and I'll call you and we can figure out a way to hang out at the beach or some sort of place to consume delicious food.  I miss u!!

O and Benjy...I kno u read this lol...have u ever lived/do u kno ne thing about Mountain View at Quinnipiac?  Lemme kno and we can discuss lol....

So I'm not really updating cuz I really have nothing to talk about, I'm just counting down the days till school starts....I just wanted to leave a note for my favorite fat lady...

im bored so im updating .... there isnt much to update ... so heres some random crap

*i heart giacomo ever so much 
*sometimes giacomo sucks but he fixes it and then hes not so bad lol 
*the midget rocks ass ... and we suck at college jeopardy AND wheel of fortune
*another name for high beams is not boobs (at least not on jeopardy)
*i seemed to have lost Kris somewhere and me thinks this isnt so much her journal anymore and that saddens me
*florida is not a cool place to go when ur 20 and with ur parents
*i hate ppl who claim to be jesusy but are the biggest ass munches in the world aka JOHN STARK
*flying scares anna but she didnt die 
*im feelin old
*i wanna go to vegas with giacomo next year but we are poor

::curtsies::

i just sat here watching Big Brother 5 and then The Amazing Race 5 ... and realized ... clearly the best ppl to watch this crap with are in howell ... :-( ... i miss Ker and Laura and Crappy and Butchy, and Spanky and Gia lol .... 

::curtsies::

ps. are we likin the new Incubus theme cause I AM lol

y cant anything in my life be awesome, and romantic, and exciting, and NOT SHITTY .... nope instead i get negative bullshit with a layer of mediocre, sprinkled with assholes, and topped with a huge steaming pile of shit .... 


FUCK THE PEOPLE THAT MAKE ME FEEL THIS WAY!!!!!!

if u hafta ask urself if u make me feel like this ... odds are u do and ur scum ....

::curtsies::

wut up homies, long time no write if i must say so myself.  but my life does not give me enough time to just sit here writtin every little thought every second of every day like some people.  alas though, today im feeling particularly chatty with no one to chat to so here i be at last resort central .... ::thumbs up and cheesy smile:: 

where to begin .... 

seein as how i cant remember past a week ago we shall start with the moment my summer began .... INCUBUS DAY #2!!!!  (which incidentally turned out to be Kellers birthday as well and a happy birthday to u my friend ... even tho u were there with me its always fun to have a Live Journal shout out).  Friday the midget, musto, keller, and i ventured out to the city to the glorious Madison Square Garden to see my future husbad and his band mates play.  anywho, semi long story short, a.) we were late to the train cause keller is slow, b.) pistola will never be anyones favorite song cause musto and kelle ruined it times 10, c.) we got to "meet" Co-Nan Obrien lol and keller and musto got to put their ass on his chair and the wet dreams continue from there for those two lol, d.) it monsooned (sp?) but we got to eat candy and chill out and look over the city and Keller and I are livin together in the city one day cause we rock its ass, e.) i bought brandons book and am one step closer to being his wife, f.) incubus rocked sooooo hardcore the show was fn amazing ... and Dave Chappele is their new basist lol, g.) the starbucks by the stairwell in penn station the goes from the LIRR and then to Amtrack SUCKS CAUSE OF MEXICANS ... goddamn mother f-ers almost ruining Incubus Day #2, and h.) apparently complete fucktards listen to incubus cause there were some dumb drunk and high mother fuckers on the train ride home that needed for me to kick there ass ....
that was about it for the first Incubus Day ... well that and i put my tampon in wrong and during the concert it kept fallin out of my vag hole ... but other then that ... INCUBUS ROCKED ASS!!!!!!!

whateve ... saturday was a chill laid back day; keller, court, musto, his cousin Andrea, and i were supposed to go to the beach and hang but court, musto, and andrea didnt go cause her car bitched out .. whateve .. me and keller chilled for awhile then came back cause our asses were tired lol ... blah blah ... end of that day 

sunday, had work early which sucked, went to giacomos house at 5 ... watched Six Feet Under ... had some sex ... went home ... end of that day ... (like how i snuck the sex in there lol funny i am lol)

monday, Incubus Day #2 ... hopped in a car with Musto, his friend Tim, and Court and drove off to Pennsyl-tucky to the Wachovia Arena to see my future husband serenade me and a bunch of other ppl lol ... we stopped by Jersey Mikes first cause musto and Tim wanted free sammiches ... me and court sat in the car and a convertable BMW thingy that was silver pulled up next to our car and some fat ridiculous middle aged man (probably with no penis) got out ... he left his top down and that CLEARLY screams "throw something into my car" so ... court gave me a piece of gum and needless to say that went right into his back seat LOL ... most excellent lol ... so then we got to pennsyl-tucky hung out there found a pisser, found a starbucks, Tim got a ticket for underage drinkin (for the love of GOD y do ppl NEED alcohol with every move they make), i decided to go on the Mary Kate Olsen Diet cause of all the twigs in the tucky of pennsly lol ... then incubus came on and all of my doubts and worries were gone and away, they sang My Girl and SPONGEBOB SQUARE PANTS ... i heart Brandon ::dream face::
oo and lastly i bought the 40 dollar tshirt i wanted and if i must say so myself i am super hot in it lol ... fuck yea ... u bitches are all jealous ... word ... LOL what did i just say lol ....

tuesday, hung out with giacomo but felt slightly depressed, watched the second season of The Office with him ... had some more sex ... then went to work to chill with kelly but alas we had to work with the fn specials but whateve fun times with Kel .... end of tuesday ... (again slipped in the sex ... muhahahaha lol)

now today (wednesday), woke up with a severe migraine at 330 in the AM .. was supposed to go to work at 9 but couldnt cause i was vomiting and tryin to be the only one who cared if i lived or died at the moment ... got to work at 1 by the grace of God, but of course the tumor in my head was makin me woosie so i left at 350 with rich (i was supposed to leave at 5 ...) laid in bed more today watched some tv and after a day of one imitrex tablet and two excedrin migraines im finally feelin better altho i still wanna vomit up my life ... so maybe im not so much doin the mary kate diet but still ... there aint no food in me ... lol 

... now that was a run down of my week ... now on to the fun stuff ... whats really inside me .... (besides guts and blood and gas and stuff) 

side note: the episode where brad pitt is on friends is on ... MOST EXCELLENT DAY

anyway ... i am annoyed for two reasons .... 
1.) i realized that today my life has turned into a Dawsons Creek episode or something and ... IM THE DAWSON!!!!!!!!! ... how sad is that ... i always thought that if i ever stumbled upon a dawsons creek show i would be Jen cause shes an independant and intellegent female figure with the coolest gay best friend ever ... but no ... im the fn DAWSON and its all part of some evil joke made by God or ... the WB or something ... lol ... and whos my Joey u ask ... Courtney Stockdale ... and her Pacey is clearly Musto ... i opt to not go into details but anyone who has ever sat down on a wednesday nite to watch the creek for four or five years of their life will no the battle of the relationships betweeen joey, pacey, and THE DAWSON ... (minus the joey and dawson goin out thing cause me and court are ladies ... sick minded freaks lol) ...

today, i feel, is a very inspirational and uplifting day ... so i am writing in this pos journal so all like two ppl who read this can feel inspirational and uplifted as well ;-) 

i have been feelin shitty lately ... feelings that come and go but seem to linger on longer then they go away ... its depressing when i think that my boyfriend is in another state, all i do is work and go to school and have no time for my friends and people in my life that really matter ... im just a generally bored individual i guess ...

today im drivin home from school and its gorgeous out, not too hot cause theres a breeze but sunny and beautiful, even driven through union, roselle, and rahway lol (trust me if uve been to any of these places u'd no that beauty is not the first word u think of lol) ... im stopped at a light on Elmora Ave (a street none of u no im sure but its a shithole) and theres this little old lady hobbling around the sidewalk ... she had to be in her 80s and she was wearin an oversized grey zip up sweatshirt, a knee length pink skirt, and running sneakers with her socks pulled up to the top of the sneakers .... she was so adorable and so sad and i probably could have watched her all day ... but after seein her hobbling, cause apparently shes old and bones suck when ur 80, i was lookin at everything around me differently (as i normally do when im touched by something) ... old couples with crazy outfits walkin down the side walk holding hands, the way that one tree separates as telephone lines pass through it and u wouldnt have noticed it (and hadnt noticed it ever) if the tiny white flowers wherent making the tree stand out on St. George Ave next to a run down gas station ... 

it seems like everything around me was tellin me that my probelms and issues with boredum were just stupid shit excuses and meant nothing in the big picture of things and showed me how selfish and obnoxious i can be ... we all can be ... 

and im not a religious person in the "normal" sense of that word religious but i looked around and i wonder how could Keller be agnostic when clearly something big cool and awesome had to create all this shit we see whether it be beautiful in that general "flowers, sunshine and of course dolphins" way (for Kris and I lol) or in the way an old woman hobbling in confusion on a street corner can change my entire outlook on life and myself and not even no it ... 

things are just amazing to me today and as much as i think this i really need to concentrate on making myself that beautiful being that can change someones life without knowing it .... i dunno how much sense that makes but thinkin about it is makin me feel better ... 

maybe im just full of shit today lol who knows but even if i am ... its something i like to think about cause it takes my mind off those stupid shit excuses and makes me focus on whats really important for me right now ... 

its cold in here and i want to nap now ... lol --no matter how much i try i cant stop the lazy lol ... 

peace homies

... its nice and quiet in here, cept for the sound of the rain and such, calming atmosphere for me to write me thinks ... 

i have my period ... and ive been told numorous times that i am my bitchiest durin that period ... i dont deny it but what am i supposed to do shit happens specially when ur on the pill ... also when im "perioding" it becomes alot easier for me to vent shit ... go figure lol 

i have decided to be annoyed at everyone in my life at the current moment ... not really everyone but the majority ... 

there comes a point in life when u realize u give more then u get and it will always be that way ... i have reached this path with people in the past and never really could figure out a way to deal with it ... instead i continued to build up this wall of hatred (that is now known as ANNA) to protect myself ... im tired of doin that, instead id rather just ignore the issue and step away from it and deal with the fact that some people just cant be the friend u want them to be ... not that they are bad people ... they just arent where u are i guess ... its a shame but shit happens 

then there are the people u step away from for months on end and they were all the friend u ever needed in the world and when u realize how stupid and rediculous u both had been, uve missed out on months of laughter and good times (in grandpa jorge) ... it seems to me tho that those friendships never really die ... they take breaks and pick up the pieces later on and stuff ... its funny how i never fully realized that the only person who understood me more then my parents, relate to me more then our significant others lol, and love me as much as i love them (in the non-flaming way of course lol) was my little one and even with our absence and what have u we both realize how life just doesnt seem to fit without each other ... i heart that little person sometimes more then i heart myself (and even the honch ....) ... i miss her mom :-( ... 

anywho ..

aslo i have grown bored of this constant pesimistic cynical attitude that i have grown into ... i mean its fine sometimes but thats not the person i wanna be and in all honesty thats not the person i am ... its a front i put up to make people feel intimidated or make them think that im tougher then what i really am ... i am a giant pile of fucked up emotions that will NEVER go away unless i deal with them .. and this attitude i have is years of bullshit and lies that i had encountered not only from peers but from my family and that hasta be the worst ... i like myself maybe about 60 percent of the time (hey its more then half) and its cause i like the fact that i can be independent but still need to have one person as a crutch sometimes ... i like that i can be honest and straight forward and not live my life in a hypocritical matter ... i like the fact that i can claim to be a "non-practicing catholic" but still have more faith in God than those who were deemed "God-squaders" ... im very secure in myself to state the obvious and be the honest girl whos not going to take no for an answer and whos never gonna let people walk all over her ... but im just tired of the way i go about it sometimes ... something to change ... something to work on ... hopefully i can never be bored (being judgemental and critizing characters ... that my friends will never change sorry lol im too good at it lol it would be a sin) ....

besides my constant state of depression lately and spirts of headaches and sudden extreme bouts of stress ... i am failry well ... specially since i just got a brand spanky new car .... of course sayin goodbye to grandpa jorge will be too difficult for me to even consider right now but ... im really tryin to concentrate on that new car smell ... 

Im gonna get my incubus tickets tomorrow ... im only gettin 4 cause i be poor ... and no one but me seems to be excited about this concert ... so even if i go by myself it will be a great experiance .... 

i think im done for today ... im totally tired and cramping and i wanna eat popcorn or cake lol ... or even both ... MMM or pizza ... 

so peace yall and thanks for reading ...
